description: CP9 is a secret World Government intelligence agency with authorization to kill. They are experts in the six superhuman martial arts techniques known as Rokushiki. In this episode, four CP9 agents are revealed to have been undercover in Water 7 for five years.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Agents Reveal Their Identities
keyMoments.description: Four CP9 agents remove their masks and reveal they have been undercover in Water 7 as trusted members of the community - Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most shocking organizational reveals in One Piece, exposing a five-year infiltration operation.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Demonstrates Rokushiki Techniques
keyMoments.description: CP9 agents demonstrate superhuman Rokushiki techniques including Tekkai, Soru, and Rankyaku.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes CP9 as elite fighters with abilities beyond normal humans.

statusHistory.reason: CP9 is actively operating their mission in Water 7

goals: Obtain the Pluton blueprints from Iceburg
Capture Nico Robin for her ability to read Poneglyphs
Carry out World Government's secret missions
influence: Global (operates as part of World Government)

description: The premier shipbuilding company in Water 7, led by Iceburg. The company is revealed to have been infiltrated by CP9 agents who posed as trusted employees for five years. Galley-La is also the secret keeper of the Pluton blueprints.

keyMoments.title: Galley-La Company Betrayed by CP9
keyMoments.description: The company discovers that several of its most trusted members - including top foremen Lucci and Kaku, and secretary Kalifa - were actually CP9 spies.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the extent of CP9's infiltration and the vulnerability of even the most secure organizations.

statusHistory.reason: Company continues to operate despite CP9 infiltration being exposed

goals: Maintain Water 7's reputation as the shipbuilding capital
